text: avaru hathattane davudara balige bandaga avaru becci biddaru. Avaru helidaru; anjabedi, navu eradu jagala nirata gumpugalu. Nam'malli ondu gumpu innondara mele an'yayavesagide. Niviga nam'ma naduve n'yayocitavagi tirpu nidiri mattu atirekavesagabedi. Sariyada margadedege nivu namage margadarsana madiri
